topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55abd34863687244b80000a3#post_55abd34863687244b80000a3
It's not great 
It's just the "superman destroyed metropolis" criticism bugs me
I mean Clark would never be able to lead zod away from the city because zod knew he was trying to defend it.
Even if Clark had dragged him away, his goons would still be wrecking it.  
And what is essentially a fight between two gods who don't even really know how to control their powers isn't going to end without some major destruction. 


Although I will admit that it's goddamn hilarious that the Nuke from the beginning of injustice did way less damage to the city
